name: Nintendo Labo: Toy-Con 04: VR Kit
overview: Nintendo Labo is an immersive experience kit in which the consumer is required to make creations from the accompanying cardboard parts in the package. After creation, each item has its specific (mini-) game accompanied on the Nintendo Labo VR software that's packed inside. Additional experiences can be accessed via the online community, providing alternative game-play experiences using the standard Labo parts or creative solutions of the community itself, by using non-provided card-board pieces. The packed-in Labo VR software gives access to the VR Plaza in which 60 mini-games are selectable. The accompanying program Toy-Con Garage VR will offer the players a look into the programming of the VR games for the Nintendo Switch and can be used to create programs of your own. The cardboard material provided in this complete kit which can be used for specific games are: Toy-Con VR Goggles Toy-Con Blaster Toy-Con Camera Toy-Con Elephant Toy-Con Bird Toy-Con Wind Pedal
